Package com.mygdx.game.Core.Customers

Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Core.Scriptable
      • com.mygdx.game.Core.Customers.CustomerController
  • public class CustomerController
extends Scriptable
    This script controls the customers and handles their logic through a variety of secondary scripts. Also handles when the current game should end.

    BlackCatStudio's Code

    Author:
    Felix Seanor, Jack Vickers

    Last modified: 23/04/2023

      • CustomerController

        public CustomerController​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 DoorPosition,

                          CustomerControllerParams params,
                          com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2... tables)
        Creates the customer controller
        Parameters:
        DoorPosition - Customer spawn and exit.
        OrderArea - First position in order line
        path - Pathfinding Module.
        CallUpGameFinish - Game Finish Function.
        params - Parameter class
        tables - Where the tables are, TEMPORARY

      • canAcceptNewCustomer

        public void canAcceptNewCustomer()
        Checks if a new customer can be accepted if so, add a new one in. End the game if the set number of waves has elapsed. Set Waves to -1 for "endless"

      • frustrationLeave
